titles.title: A bill to modify the penalties for violations of the Telephone Consumer Protection Act of 1993.
Deter Obnoxious, Nefarious, and Outrageous Telephone Calls Act of 2018
Deter Obnoxious, Nefarious, and Outrageous Telephone Calls Act of 2018
DO NOT Call Act
DO NOT Call Act
DO NOT Call Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Deter Obnoxious, Nefarious, and Outrageous Telephone Calls Act of 2018 or the DO NOT Call Act.
This bill modifies penalties for violating restrictions on the use of telephone equipment, including by increasing the maximum penalties for falsifying caller-identification information.
